text: It always astonished me that Mitsuda composed for MARIO PARTY of all things, but I suppose it's fitting. Even though it was a fairly standard board game, it felt like a true Mario adventure as a kid, something I can't speak for with the newer entries.

text: As was pointed out in the comments section of the last upload, this theme also composed by Mitsuda always reminded me of the Guardia Castle theme because of the nearly identical intro.
